summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6148 for the improvement of Mead Street from 52nd Avenue South to approximately 150 feet east and certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85726 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
